title: Mohsin Naqvi orders probe into Islamabad press club incident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 2 (APP):Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has taken serious notice of the unpleasant incident that occurred at the Islamabad Press Club and directed immediate action against those responsible.
According to a statement issued on Thursday, the Minister has sought a detailed report from the Inspector General (IG) Islamabad Police regarding the episode. He also ordered a thorough inquiry into the alleged use of force against journalists and emphasized that strict disciplinary measures must be ensured against the personnel found guilty.
“Violence against the journalist community will not be tolerated under any circumstances,” Naqvi asserted, adding that the government stands committed to safeguarding the rights and dignity of media professionals.
The Minister instructed that all officials involved in the matter should be identified without delay and dealt with in accordance with the law. He further directed the authorities to ensure that such incidents are not repeated in the future.
Journalist organizations across the capital have strongly condemned the incident and demanded accountability. The inquiry is expected to determine responsibility and set the course for disciplinary action in the coming days.
